definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: What we want to know is if they can detect those rumbles in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 我們想知道的是他們是否能檢測到地面上這些次聲波。

sentences.english: The generating and propagating mechanism of the precursory infrasound of earthquake are primarily explained.
sentences.chinese: 初步解釋了強震前兆次聲波的產生機理和傳播機制。

sentences.english: The infrasonic wave is one kind of frequency is lower than 20 hertz sound waves.
sentences.chinese: 次聲波是一種頻率低於20赫茲的聲波。

sentences.english: Objective To define the effects of intense infrasound on vestibular function in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察強次聲波對豚鼠前庭功能的影響。
